text: The Mexican Grand Prix (Gran Premio de Mexico) is a Formula One motor race held at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez in Mexico City. It first appeared as a non-championship event in 1962 before being held as a championship event from 1963-1970, 1986-1992 and since 2015. == Winners of the Mexican Grand Prix == === Repeat winners (drivers) === # of wins Driver Years 3 Jim Clark 1962*, 1963, 1967 2 Alain Prost 1988, 1990 Nigel Mansell 1987, 1992 Shared win with Trevor Taylor Active drivers are in bold.
